name: open world (itch)
description:
made for 'a game by its cover 2017'

"you awake on a beach, unsure of who or where you are; your only motivation a blinking red waypoint on the single possession you have left — a small LCD computer map. the only question now is: do you follow it?"
- based on open world by logan mills walters
http://famicase.com/17/softs/051.html

~it's so easy to get lost in what is not there~
